content.title: Festival Gift Coupons (Sainik Welfare)
content.details: The scheme provides gift coupons to ex-servicemen and their widows to support their welfare.
benefits: Support for ex-servicemen and their families
eligibility: Ex-servicemen registered with the Department of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry
Widows of Ex-servicemen registered with the Department of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry
content.application_process: The application should be submitted on a working day, during working hours to the competent authority.

faqs.question: Which Department of the UT of Puducherry administers this scheme?
faqs.answer: The scheme is administered by the Department of Sainik Welfare, Union Territory of Puducherry.

faqs.question: Are Short Service/Emergency commissioned Officers eligible to the status of ex-servicemen?
faqs.answer: Yes, if released on completion of the specific period of engagement and were given gratuity at the time of release.

faqs.question: Is this scheme also applicable to the Widows of Ex-servicemen?
faqs.answer: Yes, all Schemes are applicable only to the Ex-servicemen/Widows of Ex-servicemen registered with the Department of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry.

faqs.question: What is the procedure for seeking information through 'Right To Information (RTI)'?
faqs.answer: The required information may be asked through an application along with IPO/DD for a sum of â‚¹10/- in favour of the Director, Department of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry.

faqs.question: How can an applicant request a receipt or acknowledgement for the submitted application?
faqs.answer: The applicant should request a receipt or acknowledgement from the concerned authority to whom the application form has been submitted.

faqs.question: Can applicants track the status of their application for the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, but the applicants can request a receipt or acknowledgement from the concerned authority as a form of confirmation upon submission.

faqs.question: Is there any relaxation in the income criteria for eligibility under certain circumstances?
faqs.answer: There is no income-related eligibility criteria for this scheme.

faqs.question: Is There Any Compensation For The Delay In The Disbursal Of The Scheme Benefits?
faqs.answer: The guidelines do not mention any provision for compensation in the event of delayed disbursement of scheme benefits.

faqs.question: How can I contact the Department of Sainik Welfare, Government of Puducherry for grievance redressal/ general queries?
faqs.answer: You contact the Department of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry at (+91)(0413) 2253107, dirdsw.pon@nic.in, Monday to Friday, between 02:30 PM to 05:00 PM.
